articles.author: Mason Leib
articles.title: 'Gen V' actor Chance Perdomo dies at 27 - Good Morning America
articles.description: "Gen V" actor Chance Perdomo died following a motorcycle accident at the age of 27, his family said.
articles.content:
Chance Perdomo, star of "Gen V," has died after a motorcycle accident, his family and representatives announced. The actor was 27 years old.
No other individuals were involved in the accident, accor… [+2267 chars]
